summary: using a flagfile resets other command line warning settings

comments.content:
It seems like using the "--flagfile" command line option resets any additional "--jscomp_warning" etc flags.

The documentation describes a flagfile as: "A file containing additional command-line options."
I.e I assumed the final settings to be the combined(union) of flagfile and the other separate options.
(Personally I use the flagfile only for the "--js" flags due to the large number of files that would otherwise break the command line length limit).

------
Inspecting the code in "CommandLineRunner.java" I find that 'processFlagFile()' initially does a 'Flags.warningGuardSpec.clear();'. And since the flagfile is parsed after the separate args it results in the reset.
-------

Regards
/ Fredrik Blomqvist
